Title: Relates to the empire state commercial production credit
Summary: Relates to the empire state commercial production credit; eliminates the growth credit; increases the downstate credit from three to four million dollars and increases the percentage of qualified production costs paid from five to twenty percent for calculation of the credit; and increases the percentage of qualified production costs paid from five to thirty percent for calculation of the upstate credit.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the empire state commercial production credit
